name: WWII Operations: Lions on The Desert Front
name_original: WWII Operations: Lions on The Desert Front
description:
Albert Benito, that is your name. You were enlisted to Italy's Royal 10th Army, this is your first day, to conduct your first action. The Supreme Command orders our army to start an invasion on Egyptian soil in a few days, do you have what it takes to become a lion of the desert? 

- 1940

Lions on The Desert Front is a spin-off of WWII Operations: Desert Front, where you could play as Italian soldiers for the first time in gaming history, go through battlefields of Egypt, Ethiopia and many more in this upcoming game of 2021!

Extra credits: EM0J1 Official for cutscenes music.
